allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$content = Get-Content index.html -Raw; $pattern = ''\(?s\)  <!-- REMOVE_START -->.*?<!-- REMOVE_END -->\\r?\\n''; $content = $content -replace $pattern, ''''; Set-Content index.html -Value $content -NoNewline")
Bash(for sym in state buildings setData tableVisible setTableVisible parseURL updateURL toggleFilter setupMultiSelectFilter applyMultiSelectState setSearchQuery setCurrentUser eventsData errorsData)

Bash(for sym in state buildings teamMembers eventsData commentsData tableVisible currentUser getTagLabel getDataLabel formatRelativeTime formatDateTime formatDisplayDate getFieldDisplayValue lookupGwrByEgid escapeHtml)
Bash(for sym in state buildings getFilteredBuildings tableVisible currentUser getFieldDisplayValue escapeHtml formatDueDate getDueDateClass)
Bash(for sym in state getFilteredBuildings tableVisible setTableVisible updateURL getTagLabel getErrorType formatRelativeTime formatDateTime getFieldDisplayValue escapeHtml)
Bash(for sym in state buildings getFilteredBuildings updateURL escapeHtml)
